title: Ep. - 359 - BEHIND THE SCENES OF DISCOVERY CHANNEL, TRADING SPACES, A BABY STORY, AND MORE PRODUCER BENJAMIN RINGE
description:
Benjamin Ringe has overseen the creation, development and sales of more than 90 series and specials across 35 cable networks, broadcast television, and first run syndication including Pig Royalty on Discovery Plus. He talks about behind the scenes of Skywire Live with Nik Wallenda, the much talked about Discovery Channel special. He also gives great behind the scenes stories about Trading Spaces, A Wedding Story, A Dating Story, and A Baby Story on TLC.

 

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey

Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey

Cameo: https://cameo.com/katecasey

Twitter: https://twitter.com/katecasey

Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/katecaseyca

Clubhouse: @katecasey
